article.Heading: Changing tax through tech:CNBC-TV18 goes behind the scenes
article.Summary: The rollout of goods and services tax has a huge technology component that's been driving the change and CNBC-TV18's Jude Sannith went behind the scenes of this massive tax reform to speak to companies that are helping assessees become GST-ready.
article.Body:
The rollout of goods and services tax has a huge technology component that's been driving the change and CNBC-TV18's Jude Sannith went behind the scenes of this massive tax reform to speak to companies that are helping assessees become GST-ready.
